videoData.title: What if we could address the unaddressable?
videoData.socialTitle: What if we could address the unaddressable?

nodes.whoTheyAre: As the senior manager of integration and automation at Coyote Logistics, Mario Paluzzi oversees the development of technology that underpins a more efficient and connected world. Recently, he helped launch a mobile app for drivers and an online web portal for customers and carriers.

videoData.description: Mario Paluzzi presents us with a logistical puzzle: How can we deliver packages to the three-quarters of the global population who don't have a street address? In this what-if talk, he proposes a bold new system of pinpointing addresses not to people's homes, but to their mobile phones. It's a glimpse of the future of global package delivery.
videoData.socialDescription: Mario Paluzzi presents us with a logistical puzzle: How can we deliver packages to the three-quarters of the global population who don't have a street address? In this what-if talk, he proposes a bold new system of pinpointing addresses not to people's homes, but to their mobile phones. It's a glimpse of the future of global package delivery.
